node.description: Pomp and valour reign supreme in this shop as men and women show off their goods, stamped with their own creative and unique marking. In attempt to avoid the ego of those gathered here, several more humble patrons push their way past to continue further through the hall.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Book Shop
node.description: A large book case fits snug against the back wall where clerks lazily move back and forth, grabbing new stock for patrons, and refilling shelves from boxes on the ground. Soft murmurs between customers within the book shop are dimmed to a muted hum underneath the roars of laughter and occasional disagreements from patrons in nearby shops. The shop keeper glances with disapproving gaze at passerby's who shuffle through too noisily.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Supply Depot
node.description: Where the hallway takes a slight turn, a makeshift shop has been set up with an overly hairy attendant standing behind an expansive counter bearing deeds for sale. The pungent scent of stale tobacco lingers in the air, barely masked by occasional whiff of a sweaty patron in the room.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Office
node.description: Deeply scarred walls bear little in the way of decor in this sparse office. Pushed against a wall is a large oak desk with a matching chair. Next to the desk stands a weapon rack which is home to basic forms of a variety of weapons.

node.name: Fang Cove Crafting Society Hall, Storage
node.note: Crafting clerk|Alchemy clerk|Engineering clerk|Forging clerk|Outfitting clerk|Repair Clerk
node.description: Dull blue racks that span from floor to ceiling line the back wall behind the counter. A couple of clerks move back and forth, hanging arriving tools on the racks, and removing others to return to customers. Several broken tools sit in a bin nearby, and by their look are ready for shipping to the repair shop.

node.name: Fang Cove Engineering Society, Hallway
node.description: The entrance to the engineering wing is much wider than the other halls due to the needs of larger materials. Shuffling by, tired workers lug sacks of goods to various areas of the Society hall. Deep notches mar the wood paneling of the wall, dirty handprints add to its disorderly appearance.

node.name: Fang Cove Engineering Society, Bookstore
node.description: Workers drag large stone blocks down the hallway to various work rooms nearby leaving deep grooved paths in the dirt floor. Other society employees hurry around with various tools trying to keep the ground as flat as possible before the next block comes by. Hushed voices from passing patrons discuss the various techniques and protocols of their craft.

node.name: Fang Cove Engineering Society, Supply Depot
node.description: Hard packed dirt floors cause an everlasting cloud of dust which clings to the brick walls. A large double door guarded by two Gor'Togs allows workers to travel between the store and the outside of the building where they bring in new shipments or prepare to be transferred to one of the workshops. Blocks of superfluous stone sit on raised platforms, ready for customers to create various wares.

node.name: Fang Cove Engineering Society, Tool Store
node.description: Fully stocked crates are piled neatly against the back wall of the shop. Darting back and forth, squirly attendants seek out product for inquisitive patrons while a grizzled old man sweeps up dust and debris from the floor.

node.name: Fang Cove Engineering Society, Office
node.description: Situated against the back wall of the tiny office is an oak desk with matching chair. A large blank spot on the wall is repurposed as a place to scribble notes, and small diagrams. Attendants shuffle through occasionally, sweeping up debris left upon the floor, or to dust the furniture.

node.name: Fang Cove Outfitting Society, Weaving Room
node.description: Set in the back of the large workroom is a hefty loom. Hooks and shelves line the painted green walls, holding various tools and spools of thread that are currently not in use. To the rear of the room is a large work table and bench.

node.name: Fang Cove Outfitting Society, Weaving Room
node.description: Set in the back of the large workroom is a hefty loom. Hooks and shelves line the painted tan walls, holding various tools and spools of thread that are currently not in use. To the rear of the room is a large work table and bench.

node.name: Fang Cove Outfitting Society, Spinning Room
node.description: Simple in decor, the painted leaf green room serves more as a serious work zone than a relaxing one. Next to a large spinning wheel is a long table and chair, which are pressed against the back wall.

node.name: Fang Cove Outfitting Society, Spinning Room
node.description: Simple in decor, the painted orange room serves more as a serious work zone than a relaxing one. Next to a large spinning wheel is a long table and chair, which are pressed against the back wall.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Tool Shop
node.description: Boxes and crates of goods stacked high behind the storefront counter are packed with goods for sale. Attendants scurry about the hustle and bustle of the small shop, attempting in vain to assist customers and tend to deliveries at the same time. A beaded curtain leads back to the hallway.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Black Crucible
node.description: Crinkled patches of metal stain the dolomite floor. The splattering becomes more numerous and expands to form concentric circles near the room's center, where a large granite crucible hangs over a large fire.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Black Forge
node.description: An octagonal forge situated in the room's center emits a ruddy glow illuminating the basalt blocks framing it. In the corner, a large grindstone casts a gigantic shadow upon the wall, and wisps of steam rise up from the recently used slack tub and anvil.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Brown Crucible
node.description: Crinkled patches of metal stain the dolomite floor. The splattering becomes more numerous and expands to form concentric circles near the room's center, where a large granite crucible hangs over a large fire.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Brown Forge
node.description: An octagonal forge situated in the room's center emits a ruddy glow illuminating the basalt blocks framing it. In the corner, a large grindstone casts a gigantic shadow upon the wall, and wisps of steam rise up from the recently used slack tub and anvil.

node.name: Fang Cove Engineering Society, Workshop
node.description: Wood panel walls and matching buffed floors span the room. Several tables have been strategically set up as workstations to accomodate the needs of a crafter. The occasional conversation muffles through the door as people pass by through the hall outside.

node.name: Fang Cove Engineering Society, Damaged Workroom
node.description: Half the walls of this workspace are covered by an uneven coat of white paint while the remaining walls look as if they've barely survived an explosion of some sort. Stone fragments are lodged deeply in places and the wood is charred in other places. Mercifully, the equipment seems to be either repaired or replaced and not affected by whatever disaster affected the rest of the room. Tables and workstations provide the space craftsmen need to complete their creations.

node.name: Fang Cove, Carousel
node.description: Aside from several torches, the hewn stone wall ringing the Carousel's core is smooth and unadorned. A circular ceiling supports a vast framework of iron and timbers rising to the cavern's apex, and countless gears, pulleys and weights within the structure form the strikingly complex and beautiful mechanism which drives the Carousel.

node.name: Fang Cove, Carousel Desk
node.description: A long wooden desk spans the width of the western wall. Brass lanterns hang from the ceiling, and the floor behind the desk is covered in spotless red tile.

node.name: Fang Cove, Item Registration Office
node.description: Red tile continues its way through the open doorway and stops abruptly at a long wood counter with polished brass bars positioned to form a cage around the clerks. A soft glow comes from a single lantern placed atop a long row of filing cabinets. Papers are strewn about the tops of the cabinets and have spilled over onto the floor.

node.name: Fang Cove, Registrar's Office
node.description: Not actually a separate room, but sectioned off via a tall row of cabinets is a cramped area, just big enough to fit a table. The red tile is not so spotless here, but rather has a deep wear pattern that leads from the curtain to a chair in front of the Registrar's desk.

node.name: Fang Cove, Carousel Booth
node.description: A polished steel lever protrudes from the eastern side of the small stone-walled room, flanking a steel door to the south.

node.name: Fang Cove, Carousel Booth
node.description: A polished steel lever protrudes from the eastern side of the small stone-walled room, flanking a steel door to the south.

node.name: Fang Cove, Carousel Booth
node.description: A polished steel lever protrudes from the eastern side of the small stone-walled room, flanking a steel door to the south.

node.name: Fang Cove, Community Gazebo
node.description: Several tethered bamboo tables surrounded by cane chairs are scattered about the large area, softly lit by elongated brass lanterns that hang overhead. A makeshift speaker's podium stands at one end, while at the opposing end, a stacked riverstone fireplace crackles with the warmth of an inviting fire. Groups of local residents mill about the area, each quietly discussing the day's events and enjoying a refreshing drink at a small provisional bar nearby.

node.name: Aboard the Mammoth, Platform]
node.description: Thick, barnacle-encrusted ropes secure the platform to the mammoth's back. The wooden planks follow the curve of the beast's neck, allowing the driver an elevated vantage point as he does his best to lead the sea creature to and fro across the vast ocean. Birds' nests can be seen all around the platform and are woven intricately into the fur.

node.name: Acenamacra Pier
node.description: Beyond the harbor, spray is thrown high into the air as waves strike the enclosing reef. The crash of the surf on the coral alternates with a long, drawn-out hiss as each retreating wave regroups to try again. From the vantage of the pier, several breaks in the reef are visible, but it would take an experienced and daring captain to attempt them.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Hallway
node.description: The marble flooring of the lobby transitions suddenly into plush carpeting of the same ivory white shade. Similar plush fabric covers the walls, creating an oddly muffled effect that dampens ambient noise. A ruby-inlaid door and a sapphire-inlaid door are the only notes of color to the pale corridor.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Hallway
node.description: Plush carpeting continues down the hallway in a straight ivory white path. Similar plush fabric covers the walls, continuing the sound muffling effect by dampening ambient noise. A diamond-inlaid door and an emerald-inlaid door are the only notes of color to the pale corridor.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Bookstore
node.description: Pale birch bookshelves are lined up in straight rows at the back of the room. A cheerful attendant waits behind a simple white counter, ready to answer questions and fetch book orders.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Tool Store
node.description: Various tools for enchanting are neatly stored in the many labeled crates that fill the open birch shelving along the back wall. A cluster of attendants wait behind a long white counter, ready to answer questions and complete orders.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Supply Store
node.description: Enormous birch cabinets stand against the back wall, filled with the various scrolls and totems necessary for enchanting. A neatly-dressed attendant waits behind a white crescent-shaped counter, ready to answer questions and complete supply orders.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Society Master's Office
node.description: Pale blue walls encircle the plush ivory carpet upon which sits a rich mahogany wood desk. Expansive and covered with odd scorch marks, the desk rests in the center of the room with only one chair behind it. A large matching hutch rests to the side of the room, packed full of scrolls, various tools, and crumpled letters.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Diamond Workroom
node.description: Sparkling white velvet walls and plush ivory carpet prevent outside sounds from disturbing the peaceful sanctity of the workroom. A large marble table with curved legs provides ample working space.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Emerald Workroom
node.description: Emerald velvet walls and plush ivory carpet prevent outside sounds from disturbing the peaceful sanctity of the workroom. A large marble table with curved legs provides ample working space.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Ruby Workroom
node.description: Ruby velvet walls and plush ivory carpet prevent outside sounds from disturbing the peaceful sanctity of the workroom. A large marble table with curved legs provides ample working space.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, Sapphire Workroom
node.description: Sapphire velvet walls and plush ivory carpet prevent outside sounds from disturbing the peaceful sanctity of the workroom. A large marble table with curved legs provides ample working space.

node.name: Jungle Outpost, Encampment
node.description: Efforts have been taken to provide comforts for those who maintain a protective watch over the area's water source and nearby shrine amid the dark encampment. Imposing shadows are cast over the area by the towering durian trees, broken only by the occasional candlelight from a distant window. Hulking masses lurk in the darkness of the underbrush that crowds the narrow footpath, leading further east.

Efforts have been taken to provide comforts for those who maintain a protective watch over the area's water source and nearby shrine amid the small encampment. Towering durian trees overrun with clinging strangler figs form the soaring emergent layer of the tropical area, while lianas vines drape the many palms that afford a pleasant covering over crudely carved benches. Bamboo, ferns and a vast array of herbs mingle with the many indigenous plants that crowd the narrow footpath that heads further east.

node.name: Jungle Outpost, Encampment
node.description: Scents of wild orchids waft through the encampment from blooms that hide amid the dark underbrush and grasp at the shadowed trunks that rise into the overhead canopy. Native, nocturnal creatures flit and scramble about in the murky perimeter, their incessant buzz filling the evening air. From a nearby branch, a brilliant scarlet macaw observes the area with curiosity, startled by the sudden activity.

Scents of wild orchids waft through the area from the many vibrant blooms that vine through the underbrush and along the trunks of the surrounding trees. Colorful birds flit overhead in the upper jungle canopy, their melodious song filling the air. Making its home on a nearby branch, a brilliant scarlet macaw observes the area with curiosity, often appearing to heckle those that pass amid the many homes.

node.name: Jungle Outpost, Encampment
node.description: Subtle breezes dance amid the gently swaying palms that overhang the many homes, their curtained windows aglow with some soft, indeterminable light within. A group of weathered chairs is gathered in the darkness among the trunks of several shadowed fruit trees, while crude, bamboo wind chimes clatter faintly from their branches, a modest deterrent to the local wildlife that scurries about the draping, woody network during nightfall.

Subtle breezes dance amid the gently swaying palms that overhang the many homes, where children giggle and dart about, engaged in a game of tag. A group of weathered chairs is gathered among the trunks of several surrounding fruit trees, while crude, bamboo wind chimes clatter softly from their branches, a modest deterrent to the local wildlife.

node.name: Jungle Outpost, Encampment
node.description: Dark forms hasten along the vast woody network and purple passion vines that drape throughout the area, one particular vine hanging loosely against a hulking, shadowed tree like a snake slithering down from its lofty vantage point to feed. Several of the surrounding trees hold a variety of ripened fruit, when in season, their sweet aroma mingling with the nocturnal sounds of the enclosing jungle. Some ship's netting, strung between two trunks and forming a hammock, makes for a comfortable rest in the evening air.

A multitude of creatures travel the vast network of lianas vines and climbing purple passion flowers that drape through the area, one particular vine hangs loosely against a wide tree that towers amid the homes. Several of the surrounding trees hold a variety of ripened fruit, when in season, making them a familiar visit for many. Some ship's netting is strung between two of the larger trunks, making for a comfortable hammock in the overlying shade.

node.name: Jungle Outpost, Encampment
node.description: Make-shift benches surround a large bamboo table, where several residents occasionally gather to share a meal roasted over the stone firepit and tell tales of their day's adventure. Amid the surrounding darkness, a looming banyan tree is strung with heavy braided vines and a driftwood swing that sways gently in the evening breeze.

Make-shift benches surround a large bamboo table, where several residents occasionally gather to share a meal roasted over the stone firepit and tell tales of their day's adventure. Amid the many palms and durians that shade the area, a nearby banyan tree is strung with heavy braided vines that hold a driftwood swing.

node.name: The Art of Attack, Salesfloor
node.description: The interior walls are covered with paneling made from tropical hardwoods set into a herringbone pattern. A plushly carpeted floor allows access to the surfaces displaying the wares on offer. Blades are arranged on an albarco counter while a kapok table carries blunt weapons. In the corner a ramin stand holds long staves and pikes while a flamethorn rack exhibits bows.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Crucible
node.description: Crinkled patches of metal stain the dolomite floor. The splattering becomes more numerous and expands to form concentric circles near the room's center, where a large granite crucible hangs over a large fire.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Forge
node.description: An octagonal forge situated in the room's center emits a ruddy glow illuminating the basalt blocks framing it. In the corner, a large grindstone casts a gigantic shadow upon the wall, and wisps of steam rise up from the recently used slack tub and anvil.

node.name: Castaways' Tattoo Parlor
node.description: Thick canvas is stretched tautly over a frame of tropical wood, its bright blue hue a stark contrast to the golden sand below. Fresh air flows in from the open tent flap, filling the room with the briny scent of the sea.

node.name: Fang Cove, Carousel Family Services
node.description: A series of guarded arches line the southern wall. The complicated framework of iron and timbers spans across the ceiling. Countless gears, pulleys and weights form the strikingly complex mechanism which drives the Carousel.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, Bulk Materials
node.description: A salty breeze swirls through the open space. A freshly applied thatched roof hangs overhead and protects the countless pallets of heavy ingots, ores, and other supplies that are neatly stacked in rows by type. From time to time, a line of wagons hauls more wares from the nearby docks as ships come and go from the small, growing community.

node.name: Fang Cove, Family Vault
node.description: A Dwarven attendant stands near the entry, doing his best to ignore you but seeming anxious. A wooden platform sits in the middle of the room, and a complicated series of gears, rope and other mechanisms are focused around it.

node.name: Fang Cove Engineering Society, A Private Engineering Room
node.description: A fine layer of wood and stone shavings covers most of the well-worn granite floor. The white walls have seen better days, and black and grey scuff marks adorn much of the open space. A large workstation along one wall is unnaturally free of clutter and holds several organized tools and implements. Grunts, curses, and labored breathing from other patrons echo throughout the large workroom.

node.name: Fang Cove Outfitting Society, A Private Outfitting Room
node.description: A pure-white wainscoted hall is topped by lilac-hued paisley painted walls. Occupying the back third of the room is a solid-looking loom, while a large spinning wheel sits near the entrance. Resting atop a deep purple rug is a sturdy worktable and a comfortable, wicker chair. Running parallel along opposing walls are several hooks and shelves, holding practically every conceivable tool, spool of thread, bobbin, thimble and scrap.

node.name: Fang Cove Forging Society, A Private Forge
node.description: Thick walls struggle to contain the blistering heat of the workshop where the fires blaze endlessly night and day. The flickering flames give a reddish glow to the racks and shelves of tools and equipment, all neatly placed and ready for use. Workers enter in their protective gear from time to time, checking the equipment and reporting back to a sentry at the entry.

node.name: Fang Cove Alchemy Society, A Private Alchemy Room
node.description: A large workbench dominates one side of the room with numerous pieces of alchemical equipment scattered haphazardly upon its surface. The high, vented windows provide relief from the common, yet unpleasant, smell that permeates the room.

node.name: Fang Cove Enchanting Society, A Private Enchanting Room
node.description: Pieced together by a seemingly blind worker, the walls are covered with scraps of rugs, blankets, and carpets in a kaleidoscope of colors. A burly, light pink feldspar table is stashed in a corner of the room, providing plenty of room to work.

node.name: MAMAS Company, Fang Cove Branch
node.description: One long, polished snowflake obsidian counter dominates the large cottage, conveniently placed for easy access to customers and workers alike. Occasional noises, some quite unpleasant, come from a back room in the northwest corner. Above the magnificent mikkhalbamar double doors is a large map of the regional area. An impressive sign above the counter contains the room's only splash of color. A black armchair and a white table reside in the corner, furthest away from all the noise.

node.name: Fang Cove, Rundmolen Post Office
node.description: Tucked up against the stone wall is an expansive stone counter decorated with low relief carvings. Screens of bamboo surround the counter, partitioning it off from the bustle of the carousel traffic. Vast, countless rows of differently sized shelves are behind the counter, and complex Dwarven mechanisms can be heard as they rearrange the package-covered storage. Clerks shuffle endlessly back and forth between the counters and shelving as they assist patrons with their packaging and mailing needs.
